title: Flood in Accra Central
description: Heavy rainfall has caused flooding in several streets of Accra Central. Motorists and pedestrians are advised to avoid the area.

title: Power Outage in East Legon
description: Thereâ€™s been a sudden power outage affecting most homes in East Legon. ECG officials have been notified.

title: Traffic Build-Up on Spintex Road
description: A broken-down truck is causing a massive traffic jam near Papaye Junction. Drivers are urged to use alternative routes.

title: Fire Outbreak at Makola Market
description: A section of the Makola Market caught fire early this morning. Fire service is currently at the scene to contain the blaze.
